verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: After an OTA practice at the NovaCare Complex in Philadelphia , Pa. on Wednesday , June 6 , 2018 ( 6/6/18 )] , [ARG0: Eagles safety Malcolm Jenkins] [V: explained] [ARG1: his decision to silently display a message to President Donald Trump regarding the rescinded invitation for a Super Bowl celebration at the White House] .

After an OTA practice at the NovaCare Complex in Philadelphia , Pa. on Wednesday , June 6 , 2018 ( 6/6/18 ) , [ARG0: Eagles safety Malcolm Jenkins] explained his decision to [ARGM-MNR: silently] [V: display] [ARG1: a message] [ARG2: to President Donald Trump] [C-ARG1: regarding the rescinded invitation for a Super Bowl celebration at the White House] .

After an OTA practice at the NovaCare Complex in Philadelphia , Pa. on Wednesday , June 6 , 2018 ( 6/6/18 ) , Eagles safety Malcolm Jenkins explained his decision to silently display [ARG0: a message] to President Donald Trump [V: regarding] [ARG1: the rescinded invitation for a Super Bowl celebration at the White House] .
